testcaseName: 2nd dose of Moderna Covid-19 Vaccine at 28 - 5 days
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from invalid dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered the second dose of the Moderna Covid-19 vaccine at 28 - 5 days after the first dose, and after the cessation date of 10/24/21, that the dose is not valid.  A repeat dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
v4.21 - Updated past due date to 8 weeks per 02/22/22 Clinical Considerations guidelines
v4.13 - Updated test case to include ACIP recommendation where if a second dose of a MRNA Covid-19 vaccine is given earlier than the 4-day grace period, and after the 10/24/2021 cessation date, that a repeat dose should be forecast.
